InfoPage.title: Information
InfoPage.subtitle: Exclusive pre-sale of the CENT token
InfoPage.welcome_p1: You are on the page for the exclusive pre-listing sale of the CENT token. This is a unique opportunity to purchase our project's tokens before their official listing on cryptocurrency exchanges.
InfoPage.welcome_p2: We have made the process as simple and transparent as possible. The entire procedure is based on direct cryptocurrency transfers, which ensures security and reliability.
InfoPage.prelisting_p1: Pre-listing is an exclusive period when our CENT tokens are available for purchase directly from the team before they are publicly traded. By participating in the pre-sale, you get:

benefits.benefit1: Early Access: The opportunity to purchase tokens before they are available to the general public.
benefits.benefit2: Direct Support: Your funds directly contribute to the platform's development, marketing, and future listings.

steps.step1: Define the amount: Specify how many CENT you want to purchase.
steps.step2: Choose the currency: Pay for the purchase using one of the popular cryptocurrencies.
steps.step3: Make the transfer: Send the exact amount to the specified wallet address.
steps.step4: Your tokens are safe: After the transfer is confirmed, the CENT tokens will be credited to your balance in your personal account. (Crediting can take from 5 minutes to 24 hours)
steps.disclaimer: (Crediting can take from 5 minutes to 24 hours)

InfoPage.vision_p1: We believe in a future where finance is open and accessible to everyone. LibertyCent aims to be a key part of this new era. Your participation today is an investment in this vision.
InfoPage.vision_p2: Join us. Become part of the LibertyCent story.
